REUTERS.UNKNOWN: L C f1299 reute u f BC-SIOUX-CITY-HOGS-STEAD 04-07 0072

TEXT.TITLE: SIOUX CITY HOGS STEADY/UP 1.25 DLR - USDA
TEXT.BODY: barrow and gilt prices were mostly 1.00 dlr higher, instances up 1.25, few early sales steady to up 0.50 dlr, in active trade, the usda said. top 51.50 dlrs per cwt. us 1-3 220-260 lbs near 275 head 51.75. us 1-3 220-260 lbs 51.00-51.50, near 360 head early 50.50-51.00 and 200-220 lbs 50.00-51.00. sows - up 2.00 dlrs. us 1-3 500-650 lbs 47.50-48.00. Reuter
